dayata kirula pradarshanaya pawathi bhumiyehi ayojakayin sandaha aayojana awastha udakara demin karmanthapurayak aarambha karana bawa uthuru mada palath pradhana amathi barti premalal disanayaka mahatha pawasiya.ee sandaha athigaru janadhipathithumange ekangathawayada labi athayi ki pradhana amathyawaraya yojitha karmanthapuraya aarambha wimath samanga janathawage aarthikaya thawaduratath shakthimath wi palathe aluth pibidimak athiwanu athayida kiya.uthuru mada palath pradhana amathyanshaya ha anuradhapura disthrik wanija mandalaya ekwa sanwidhanaya kala uthuru mada palath aayojana samuluwedi pradhana amathiwaraya me bawa pawasiya.meya anuradhapura heritej hotalayedi pawathwini.thawath wasara kipayak thula sancharakayin wadima pirisak eekarashi wana nagarayak bawata anuradhapuraya pathwana nisa palathe sancharaka karmanthaya thawaduratath shakthimath kirimata mehidi awadhanaya yomu kerini.mita pera aarambha kala badairingu wagawen lada sarthakathwaya matha aarthika bogayak lesa soya waga kirimatath ee anuwa soya thel ha punnakku nishpadana karmanthashalawak aarambha kirimatath salasum kere.mita amatharawa palathe janathawage aarthikaya shakthimath kirimata haki nawa karmantha awastha handunagena ee sandaha aayojakayinta ida prastha labadimata piyawara gena atha.widuliya, paniya jalaya, manmawath aadi siyalu yatithala pahasukam walin oyamaduwa pradarshanaya pawathi bhumi pradeshaya samanwitha wana bawa mehidi kiya siti pradhana amathiwaraya enisa apekshitha karmanthapuraya ehi sthapitha kirimata kisidu badhawak nomathi bawada pawasiya..
